channel.title: CVE Feed for Unitronics -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unitronics -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6448|2024-08-02T08:28:21.839Z -- unitronics -- visilogic
item.description: Unitronics VisiLogic before version 9.9.00, used in Vision and Samba PLCs and HMIs, uses a default administrative password. An unauthenticated attacker with network access can take administrative control of a vulnerable system.

item.title: CVE-2023-2003|2024-08-02T06:05:27.093Z -- unitronics -- vision1210
item.description: Embedded malicious code vulnerability in Vision1210, in the build 5 of operating system version 4.3, which could allow a remote attacker to store base64-encoded malicious code in the device's data tables via the PCOM protocol, which can then be retrieved by a client and executed on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-27771|2024-08-02T00:41:54.438Z -- unitronics -- unistream%20unilogic
item.description:
